messages.message: Becareful around skeletons you didn't bring with you
Green acid lasers are not safe for princesses or kittens
Skeletons are immune to some magic, but not fire
Ask permission before playing in underground crypts
If you are lost in hidden passages try moving in all directions
A collapsed tunnel with a sparkle of light past the fallen bricks.
Cold stone blocks.  The cold grey and fiery red patterns must mean something!
